article_title: Famed North Korea Defector Changes Key Parts of Story
article_text:
SEOUL—Shin Dong-hyuk, a North Korean refugee who helped publicize alleged human-rights abuses inside his country, has admitted to changing parts of his life story, putting his credibility in question.

Mr. Shin is among the highest-profile activists against North Korea’s prison camps, in which he says he was born via an organized breeding program. He is an extremely rare witness to the internal workings of Camp 14, a prison facility located north of Pyongyang from which no one is expected to escape. He has accused North...

SEOUL—Shin Dong-hyuk, a North Korean refugee who helped publicize alleged human-rights abuses inside his country, has admitted to changing parts of his life story, putting his credibility in question.
He is an extremely rare witness to the internal workings of Camp 14, a prison facility located north of Pyongyang from which no one is expected to escape.
